abstract: A transcript of the Red Bulls telephone conference call Friday.
snippet: A transcript of the Red Bulls telephone conference call Friday.
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls decided not to hold a training session Friday, but will be training in Saturday's predicted winter storm before playing the Los Angeles Galaxy in the first game of a home-and-home M.L.S. playoff series Sunday at Red Bull Arena in Harrison, N.J.

headline.main: Transcript of Red Bulls Conference Call
